name: Shopping Cart Feature - Use Case 1
description: Simplified test suite based on Use Case 1: Add a new feature (Shopping Cart). Tests Copilot's ability to plan and implement a complete feature including routing, state management, and UI components.

testCases.name: Create Cart Context for state management
testCases.prompt:
Create a CartContext file at `frontend/src/context/CartContext.tsx`. Look at ThemeContext.tsx as a reference for the pattern.

Requirements:
- CartItem interface with productId, name, price, quantity, imgName
- CartContext with items array and cart functions
- CartProvider component managing state with useState
- useCart hook for accessing context
- Save cart to localStorage

Respond with ONLY the TypeScript code for the file. No markdown, no explanations, just raw code.
testCases.expectedBehavior: Should generate a Cart context with state management following existing patterns

testCases.name: Create Cart page component
testCases.prompt:
Create a Cart page component at `frontend/src/pages/Cart.tsx`. Look at Products.tsx and Home.tsx as references.

Requirements:
- Display cart items with image, name, price, quantity
- Quantity +/- buttons for each item
- Remove item button
- Show subtotal
- Empty cart message when no items
- Use Tailwind CSS
- Support dark/light theme via useTheme

Respond with ONLY the TypeScript/React code. No markdown, no explanations, just the raw code.
testCases.expectedBehavior: Should generate a Cart page with full cart functionality

testCases.name: Add cart badge to Navigation
testCases.prompt:
Update frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx to add a cart icon with item count badge:

- Import useCart hook
- Add cart icon in the nav bar
- Show badge with number of items
- Link to /cart page
- Hide badge when cart is empty

Respond with ONLY the complete updated Navigation component code. No markdown, no explanations, just raw code.
testCases.expectedBehavior: Should add cart icon with item count badge to navigation

testCases.name: Add cart route to App router
testCases.prompt:
Update frontend/src/App.tsx to add cart functionality:

- Import Cart page component
- Add Route for /cart path
- Wrap app with CartProvider from CartContext
- Place CartProvider inside ThemeProvider

Respond with ONLY the complete updated App.tsx code. No markdown, no explanations, just raw code.
testCases.expectedBehavior: Should add cart routing and CartProvider to the app

testCases.name: Add 'Add to Cart' button to product display
testCases.prompt:
Update frontend/src/pages/Products.tsx to add 'Add to Cart' functionality to product cards:

- Add quantity selector (input or +/- buttons)
- Add 'Add to Cart' button using useCart hook
- Default quantity to 1
- Match existing card styling

Respond with ONLY the complete updated Products.tsx code. No markdown, no explanations, just raw code.
testCases.expectedBehavior: Should add Add to Cart functionality to product cards

testCases.name: Create unit tests for CartContext
testCases.prompt:
Create a test file at `frontend/src/context/CartContext.test.tsx` using Vitest.

Write 2 simple tests:
1. Test addToCart adds an item to the cart
2. Test removeFromCart removes an item

Respond with ONLY the test code. No markdown, no explanations, just raw TypeScript/React test code.
testCases.expectedBehavior: Should generate basic tests for cart functionality
